title: How to Make Steak Seasoning

steps.headline: Melt butter in a little bowl.
steps.description: Place in the microwave to melt.

steps.headline: Add lemon salt with crushed pepper to taste.
steps.description: If the seasoning tastes too buttery, add more lemon salt and pepper.

steps.headline: Put all of the ingredients into a blender or, if you have one, a spice grinder.
Use as required for the steak you're cooking.
Transfer the rest to a storage container for long term keeping.
Place all of the ingredients into a bowl.
Keep leftover seasoning in a spice shaker.
Put all of the ingredients into a blender, spice mill or food processor.
Blend, grind or pulse the spices to mix together.
steps.description: Only blend until coarsely ground, not crushed completely.

steps.headline: Transfer to an airtight spice container.

text: Buttery lemon salt seasoning Melt butter in a little bowl. Place in the microwave to melt. Add lemon salt with crushed pepper to taste. If the seasoning tastes too buttery, add more lemon salt and pepper. Mix together until combined.  Use to season the steak.  Montreal steak seasoning Put all of the ingredients into a blender or, if you have one, a spice grinder.  Pulse or grind. Coarsely grind only. Use as required for the steak you're cooking.  Transfer the rest to a storage container for long term keeping. The container should be airtight. Enhancing steak seasoning Place all of the ingredients into a bowl. Mix well. Use for seasoning the steak.  Keep leftover seasoning in a spice shaker.  All purpose steak seasoning Put all of the ingredients into a blender, spice mill or food processor.  Blend, grind or pulse the spices to mix together. Only blend until coarsely ground, not crushed completely. Transfer to an airtight spice container. Use to season when needed.
